Hola!

Bueno, este es mi primer mod.

lo unico que he hecho, ha sido mejorar (o eso creo yo xD) , alargando la falda  y las modificar las hombreras.(solo para personajes masculinos)

Gracias y espero que les guste.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello!

Well, this is my first mod.

the only thing I\'ve done has been to improve (or so I think xD), lengthening the skirt and changing pads.(only for MALE)

Textures are NOT included (here http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1193)

Only works for large bodies \"_1\"(lot of weight)

Thanks and I hope you like it.

Sorry for my English.
author: Indur82
